location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Jonathan Duncan, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a copy of a communication (not present) sent by the Acting Resident to Neil Benjamin Edmonstone, Chief Secretary to Government, Fort William, Calcutta. The date of the letter being transmitted is not mentioned, however it is possibly William Bruce's communication of 7 January 1811 (see f. 12-12v).
